isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - HARD START AND NO START DIAGNOSTICS - Test Procedures - Key On Engine Off Injector Test

svcproc.title: Key On Engine Off Injector Test
svcproc.para: To determine if fuel injectors are working (electronically) by energizing injectors in a programmed sequence. The ECM monitors this test and transmits DTCs, if injectors or injector circuits are not working correctly.

item.para: Electronic Service Tool (EST) with Master Diagnostics Software

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the foreword of this manual. Follow all warnings, cautions, and notes.

figure.caption: Key On Engine Off Injector Test

note.para: Test 8 (Key On Engine Off Standard Test) must have been done before doing the Key On Engine Off Injector Test.

step1.para: Select Diagnostics from the menu bar.
Select Key On Engine Off Tests from the drop down menu.
From the Key On Engine Off Diagnostics menu, select Injector Test and click Run to start the test.

note.para: During this test, injector solenoids should click when actuated. If a series of clicks are not heard for each injector, one or more injectors are not activating.

step1.para: Record DTCs on Hard Start and No Start Diagnostics form.
See Appendix B in this manual for DTCs.

item.para: Injector wiring harness open or shorted
Bad wiring harness connection on injector coil
Open or shorted engine wiring harness to injectors
